Class ProjectDB

java.lang.Object
data.ProjectDB
public class ProjectDB extends Object
Data access class for Project objects. Handles storage and retrieval of projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ProjectDB()
    Constructs a new ProjectDB and loads existing data if available.

    • addProject

      public boolean addProject(Project project)
      Adds a new project to the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to add
      Returns:
      true if the project was added, false if project name already exists

    • updateProject

      public boolean updateProject(Project project)
      Updates an existing project in the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to update
      Returns:
      true if the project was updated, false if project name not found

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(String projectName)
      Deletes a project from the database.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to delete
      Returns:
      true if the project was deleted, false if project name not found

    • getProject

      public Project getProject(String projectName)
      Gets a project by name.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to get
      Returns:
      The project, or null if not found

    • getAllProjects

      public List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets all projects in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects

    • getAllVisibleProjects

      public List<Project> getAllVisibleProjects()
      Gets all visible projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all visible projects

    • getProjectsByManager

      public List<Project> getProjectsByManager(String managerNric)
      Gets all projects created by a specific manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - The NRIC of the manager
      Returns:
      A list of projects created by the manager

    • getProjectsByOfficer

      public List<Project> getProjectsByOfficer(String officerNric)
      Gets all projects handled by a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      A list of projects handled by the officer

    • getVisibleProjectsByMaritalStatus

      public List<Project> getVisibleProjectsByMaritalStatus(boolean isMarried)
      Gets all projects that are open for applications by a specific marital status.
      Parameters:
      isMarried - Whether to filter for married applicants
      Returns:
      A list of visible projects suitable for the marital status

    • filterByNeighborhood

      public List<Project> filterByNeighborhood(List<Project> projects, String neighborhood)
      Filters projects by neighborhood.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to filter
      neighborhood - The neighborhood to filter by
      Returns:
      A filtered list of projects

    • filterByFlatType

      public List<Project> filterByFlatType(List<Project> projects, FlatType flatType)
      Filters projects by flat type availability.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to filter
      flatType - The flat type to filter by
      Returns:
      A filtered list of projects
